self.description: The URL of these count details.

issuesFixedCount.description: Count of issues where the `fixVersion` is set to the version.

issuesAffectedCount.description: Count of issues where the `affectedVersion` is set to the version.

issueCountWithCustomFieldsShowingVersion.description: Count of issues where a version custom field is set to the version.

customFieldUsage.description: List of custom fields using the version.

fieldName.description: The name of the custom field.

customFieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

issueCountWithVersionInCustomField.description: Count of the issues where the custom field contains the version.

items.description: List of custom fields using the version.
